name: peer_metrics_average
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool marketci_analytics.
Tool description: Stock Market Endpoint for Price Forecasts, Probability, Cash Flow Models , and Peer Comps 
API description: Fetches the average of company peer metrics for trailing twelve months (TTM) data via RapidAPI.

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company for which to retrieve peer metrics.
